    • Method Detail

      • setMaxSpeed

        public void setMaxSpeed(double maxOutput)
        Scale the output speed to the specified maxOutput value. The drivespeed is multiplied by this value.

        The default value is 1.0.

        Parameters:
        maxOutput - Multiplied with the output percentage computed by the drive functions.

      • setRange

        public void setRange(double min,
                     double max)
        Sets the clipped range for the drive inputs.

        The default clip range is -1.0 to 1.0. Inputs smaller than the minimum are set to -1 and inputs greater than 1 are set to 1. See clipRange(double)

        Parameters:
        min - The minimum value of the range.
        max - The maximum value of the range.

      • clipRange

        public double clipRange(double value)
        Returns minimum range value if the given value is less than the set minimum. If the value is greater than the set maximum, then the method returns the maximum value.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to clip.

      • stopMotor

        public abstract void stopMotor()

      • normalize

        protected void normalize(double[] wheelSpeeds)
        Normalize the wheel speeds if any value is greater than 1
